content: this mariner s hat knitting pattern will work up into the perfect ribbed beanie the hat is easy to make with advanced beginner knitters in mind using knit and purl stitches you will create ribbing learn to knit in the round and it will also introduce you to decreasing and shaping this hat will be super cozy to wear in the cold weather yarn any medium 04 yarn/aran/worsted/10 ply 100g i used 1 skein of alize lanagold classic in 521 you can purchase alize yarns from yarnstreet or on etsy a good yarn substitute - cascade 220 superwash aran needles 5 5mm us 9 16 circular knitting needles please note you may have to change your needles for the decreases of the hat if working on the circulars becomes too tight this would mean using a set of size 5 5 mm double-pointed needles dpns if you do not have those you could use a 60cm/24″ cable and use the magic loop technique skills level advanced beginner this is an advanced beginner-level knitting pattern and the techniques involved are the knit stitch purl stitch increasing decreasing and working in the round sizing baby/toddler/child/adult don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern or any items created using the directions in this pattern without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information 1 https //www handylittleme com/mariners-hat-pattern/ 2 https //www handylittleme com/product/the-mariners-hat-pattern-pdf/
